title: Earth elemental
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all elementals, see [list of elementals](/List_of_elementals "List of elementals").*

| earth elemental E [![Earth elemental.png](/images/a/a6/Earth_elemental.png)](/File:Earth_elemental.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                                          | 29-60                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                                              | 6                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                                          | 84                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [Speed](/Monster_speed "Monster speed")                                                                 | 6                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                                                      | 14                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                                                | 4                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                                          | Immune                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| Attack1                                                                                                 | 40 ([hit](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                                 | [rF+++](/Fire "Fire") [rC+++](/Cold "Cold") [rElec+++](/Electricity "Electricity") [rPois+++](/Poison "Poison") [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation") [rMiasma](/Miasma "Miasma") [rN+++](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") [rTorm](/Torment "Torment") [rPetrify](/Petrify "Petrify") |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                                       | None                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                                                           | Land                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence")                                            | [Brainless](/Category:Brainless_intelligence "Category:Brainless intelligence")                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                                        | [Uses nothing](/Category:Uses_nothing "Category:Uses nothing")                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                                        | [Non-living](/Category:Nonliving_holiness "Category:Nonliving holiness")                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |

| Flags                                                                                                   | [Unbreathing](/Unbreathing "Unbreathing")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |

|   |                                                                                                                       |
| - | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A spirit drawn from the elemental plane of earth, which exists in this world by inhabiting a lump of earth and rocks. |

## Useful Info

**Earth elementals** are lumbering brutes. They are easily outrun, but are durable, and are immune to most common elements. They appear in [the Elven Halls](/The_Elven_Halls "The Elven Halls"), though [deep elf elementalists](/Deep_elf_elementalist "Deep elf elementalist") can summon them with [Awaken Earth](/Awaken_Earth "Awaken Earth"). You can summon them by using [Qazlal](/Qazlal "Qazlal")'s Elemental Force (when used on clouds of sparse dust or calcifying dust).

## Tips & Tricks

- They are slow. If you find a lone earth elemental, you can easily [kite](/Kite "Kite") it.
- While elemental spellcasters may have a hard time with them, they'll take decent damage from any irresistible spell ([Irradiate](/Irradiate "Irradiate"), [Iskenderun's Mystic Blast](/Iskenderun%27s_Mystic_Blast "Iskenderun's Mystic Blast"), etc.).
  - Don't bother using [Magic Dart](/Magic_Dart "Magic Dart"), [Sandblast](/Sandblast "Sandblast"), or throwing [stones](/Stone "Stone"). The elemental's [AC](/AC "AC") means that you won't deal much damage with these weak options.
- Try not to let yourself get surrounded by earth elementals. Each elemental can deal up to 40 damage per hit, so 8 elementals can deal lots of damage. Plus, since they are immune to various elements, monsters can fire [Lightning Bolts](/Lightning_Bolt "Lightning Bolt"), [Stunning Bursts](/Stunning_Burst "Stunning Burst"), [Fireballs](/Fireball "Fireball"), and other elemental spells through them.

## History

- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), you could summon your own earth elementals by evoking a [stone of tremors](/Stone_of_tremors "Stone of tremors").
html:
Earth elemental

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all elementals, see list of elementals.

earth elemental E 
HP 29-60
HD 6
XP 84
Speed 6
AC 14
EV 4
Will Immune
Attack1 40 (hit: plain)


Resistances rF+++
rC+++
rElec+++
rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
rPetrify
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Brainless
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Non-living
Size Large
Type elemental, earth elemental
Flags Unbreathing
A spirit drawn from the elemental plane of earth, which exists in this world by inhabiting a lump of earth and rocks.

Useful Info

Earth elementals are lumbering brutes. They are easily outrun, but are durable, and are immune to most common elements. They appear in the Elven Halls, though deep elf elementalists can summon them with Awaken Earth. You can summon them by using Qazlal's Elemental Force (when used on clouds of sparse dust or calcifying dust).

Tips & Tricks

  • They are slow. If you find a lone earth elemental, you can easily kite it.
  • While elemental spellcasters may have a hard time with them, they'll take decent damage from any irresistible spell (Irradiate, Iskenderun's Mystic Blast, etc.).
    • Don't bother using Magic Dart, Sandblast, or throwing stones. The elemental's AC means that you won't deal much damage with these weak options.
  • Try not to let yourself get surrounded by earth elementals. Each elemental can deal up to 40 damage per hit, so 8 elementals can deal lots of damage. Plus, since they are immune to various elements, monsters can fire Lightning Bolts, Stunning Bursts, Fireballs, and other elemental spells through them.

History

  • Prior to 0.19, you could summon your own earth elementals by evoking a stone of tremors.

{{version030}}
{{list of|elementals}}
{{monster info}}
==Useful Info==
'''Earth elementals''' are lumbering brutes. They are easily outrun, but are durable, and are immune to most common elements. They appear in [[the Elven Halls]], though [[deep elf elementalist]]s can summon them with [[Awaken Earth]]. You can summon them by using [[Qazlal]]'s Elemental Force (when used on clouds of sparse dust or calcifying dust).

==Tips & Tricks==
*They are slow. If you find a lone earth elemental, you can easily [[kite]] it.
*While elemental spellcasters may have a hard time with them, they'll take decent damage from any irresistible spell ([[Irradiate]], [[Iskenderun's Mystic Blast]], etc.).
**Don't bother using [[Magic Dart]], [[Sandblast]], or throwing [[stone]]s. The elemental's [[AC]] means that you won't deal much damage with these weak options.
*Try not to let yourself get surrounded by earth elementals. Each elemental can deal up to 40 damage per hit, so 8 elementals can deal lots of damage. Plus, since they are immune to various elements, monsters can fire [[Lightning Bolt]]s, [[Stunning Burst]]s, [[Fireball]]s, and other elemental spells through them.

== History==
*Prior to [[0.19]], you could summon your own earth elementals by evoking a [[stone of tremors]].
